titles.title: The Cloud Received Christ From Their Sight

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The cloud received Christ from their sight. They stood, their mouths agape. Reminded of the things He taught His people still do wait.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The cloud kept safe God's people as Through the dry sea they trod, And led them through the wilderness; They truly walked with God!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: On Sinai's height the cloud did rest To make a home below. The Ark first then His written Word His presence now would show.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Appearing on the mercy seat within the inmost place, the Temple showed God's promises to save our fallen race.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: On mountain high Christ's face did shine like sun, a blazing light. The cloud once more appeared on earth a truly fearful sight.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
While here in flesh You taught us, Lord
The object sure and right:
To see our Father's glory bright,
To have eternal life.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
A goal beyond our reach You've shown;
We cannot pay the price.
No work of ours atones for sin,
We cannot set things right.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
You are the Truth, You are the Way
for us to see His face.
You died for us a sinner's death
abandoned in our place.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
On Easter day, Lord, You were raised
Firstfruits of our new Life;
And in the cloud we see the day
When joy will end all strife.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
We wait to see the cloud's return
To be with us below,
When You fulfill Your promises
To bring us to Your home.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
And though we wait to see You now
We know that You are near.
Your promises to build our faith
Are stronger than our fear.

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
You give us faith by Your strong Word
In water, wine, and bread.
The Spirit works through earthly means,
in pastures green we're fed.
